title: Never Wait for Seconds!
episode_desc: Larry saves a line-cutter from an angry mob and deals with a tip-flipper.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: The Shucker
episode_desc: Larry is blackmailed by an employee and tormented by someone from his past; he and Jeff pitch a new creative venture.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Fatwa!
episode_desc: On Jeff and Susie's daughter Sammi's wedding day, Larry has a scheduling conflict, takes issue with some work associates, and hosts a pair of ungrateful houseguests.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Happy New Year
episode_desc: Larry kicks off the new year with new rival Mocha Joe; at a cocktail party hosted by Jeff and Susie, Larry gets roped into lunch plans and has a misunderstanding with a caterer.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Side Sitting
episode_desc: Larry's lawyer tries to resolve the situation with his assistant, Alice; Larry surprises Susie with an impressive birthday gift and comes one step closer to exacting revenge on Mocha Joe.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Artificial Fruit
episode_desc: Larry drops the ball when he gets the chance to make amends with his assistant Alice. Larry and Richard go to extreme lengths for their upcoming lunch date.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: You're Not Going to Get Me to Say Anything Bad About Mickey
episode_desc: Travel plans go awry when Larry brings an impromptu date to a destination wedding. At the hotel, Larry finds himself in a sticky situation when he goes searching for a toothbrush.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Insufficient Praise
episode_desc: Larry receives a problematic gift from Freddy Funkhouser, causes trouble with Richard's new girlfriend, and offends one of Jeff's A-list clients.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: The Surprise Party
episode_desc: Susie is planning a surprise party for Jeff; and Larry makes an unlikely new friend.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: The Ugly Section
episode_desc: Larry attempts to capitalize on a friend's unexpected death, takes issue with a pattern of discrimination at a trendy restaurant, and offers his dermatologist's son a job; Richard has a suspiciously-good day on the golf course.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Elizabeth, Margaret and Larry
episode_desc: A prominent actor shadows Larry to prepare for an upcoming role; Larry meddles in the sale of Cheryl's sister's house, helps Leon grow a new business, and stirs up trouble at a dinner party hosted by Richard's girlfriend.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Beep Panic
episode_desc: Mocha Joe hatches a plan to sabotage his adversary. Larry develops a debilitating habit and takes pity on a waitress. Richard prepares for a career-defining role.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: The Spite Store
episode_desc: Larry runs into an unwelcome familiar face, seeks a second opinion on his knee injury and causes a rift between expectant parents.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: The Five-Foot Fence
episode_desc: While his latest venture is threatened by forces outside his control, Larry attends an unprecedented event at Albert Brooks' house.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Angel Muffin
episode_desc: Larry is forced to attend an ill-fated work meeting and investigates the truth behind a faulty toilet. Determined to unravel a mystery of his own, Jeff employs Larry's detective skills.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: The Mini Bar
episode_desc: In a last-ditch effort, Larry enlists Cheryl's help with a project and, later, concocts a plan that could finally save his newest creative venture.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: The Watermelon
episode_desc: After agreeing to take Susie's new rabbi golfing, Larry then cashes in on her favor. Later, Larry's appeal to Woody Harrelson's animal rights activism comes with unexpected consequences.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: IRASSHAIMASE!
episode_desc: While he and his date swap secrets, Larry runs afoul of the rules and regulations at a sushi restaurant. No good deed goes unpunished for Freddy Funkhouser.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Man Fights Tiny Woman
episode_desc: Larry navigates the complexities of requesting a new chauffeur, letting his roofer do his job, and imparting some constructive criticism to his chiropractor.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Irma Kostroski
episode_desc: Ahead of Election Day, Larry befriends City Councilwoman Irma Kostroski while mediating a conflict between a difficult actor and his prop master.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: What Have I Done?
episode_desc: Larry does damage control to remain in Irma's good graces while encouraging Leon to monetize his knack for husbandly counsel.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: Igor, Gregor, & Timor
episode_desc: Larry seizes an opportunity to avoid Irma as he's roped into Jeff's latest apology tour.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

title: The Mormon Advantage
episode_desc: With the city council vote rapidly approaching, Larry gives some unsolicited marriage advice and hosts an event for an American hero.
show_desc: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.
